title: Review: Purity Ring – Ungirthed 7″
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/purityring.jpg "purityring")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6949-review-purity-ring-ungirthed-7/attachment/purityring/)

_Ungirthed_ is the first 7” to be released from disco-dream-pop inspired act [**Purity Ring**](http://www.myspace.com/purityring). Their work is slow, seductively enchanting and wonderfully angelic. Title track _Ungirthed_ closest contemporary is perhaps Lykke Li, capturing her innocent yet assertive tone while mixing the style with an electronic infused twist. Definitely a group to watch out for. Check out the _track Ungirthed_ as well as the B-side _[Lofticries](http://soundcloud.com/purity-ring/lofticries)_ below. If you like what you hear, pick it up on [Transparent.](http://www.transparentblog.com/blog/932/tp027-purity-ring)

[Ungirthed](http://soundcloud.com/purity-ring/purity-ring-ungirthed) by [PURITY RING](http://soundcloud.com/purity-ring)
